data.lyric:
[ti:Loyal (feat. Drake)]
[ar:PARTYNEXTDOOR/Drake]
[al:Loyal (feat. Drake)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Loyal (feat. Drake) - PARTYNEXTDOOR/Drake
[00:02.35]PARTYNEXTDOOR：
[00:09.35]True you're a star in my head
[00:13.72]You nuh need fi raise war with my friends
[00:18.30]True you're so bad we don't need to pretend
[00:21.18]But I don't want war with you or my friends
[00:26.95]You're my best friend
[00:31.51]You're my best friend
[00:35.96]Please stay true but we can part again yeah yeah
[00:40.64]Because true you're my best friend
[00:45.89]All the way 'round I'm loyal
[00:47.68]I got money on me and I'm loyal
[00:50.00]I got money in my pocket I'm loyal ooh
[00:55.05]Pain goes away when I'm tipsy
[00:57.15]Pain goes away when you're with me
[00:58.85]Me
[00:59.46]Even when your troubles all look risky
[01:01.06]It's all under control
[01:04.05]Shawty just don't let this go
[01:06.59]Just don't let this go
[01:08.69]We spent the last three summers on our own
[01:11.01]Spent the summer on our own
[01:13.17]We get it on and then you go
[01:18.00]I just don't want anyone
[01:20.46]No one
[01:21.17]No one at home
[01:22.15]Drake/PARTYNEXTDOOR：
[01:22.41]True you're a star in my head
[01:26.05]It's the truth
[01:26.94]You nuh need fi raise war with my friends no no
[01:31.55]True you're so bad we don't need to pretend
[01:34.46]But I don't want war with you or my friends
[01:39.45]Drake：
[01:40.05]You're my best friend
[01:44.73]You're my best friend
[01:49.20]Because true when we can part again
[01:53.53]You'll see you you're my best friend
[01:57.89]PARTYNEXTDOOR：
[01:58.95]All the way 'round I'm loyal
[02:00.87]Oh
[02:00.93]I got money on me and I'm loyal
[02:02.88]Oh
[02:03.12]I got money in my pocket I'm loyal ooh
[02:05.64]Oh
[02:08.06]Pain goes away when I'm tipsy
[02:09.72]Oh
[02:10.30]Pain goes away when you're with me
[02:12.07]Me oh
[02:12.61]Even when your troubles all look risky
[02:14.15]It's all under control
[02:16.92]PARTYNEXTDOOR/Drake：
[02:17.21]Shawty just don't let this go
[02:19.66]Just don't let this go
[02:21.73]We spent the last three summers on our own
[02:24.14]Spent the summers on our own
[02:26.44]We get it on and then you go
[02:30.91]I just don't wanna let go
[02:34.50]No one at home
[02:35.85]Drake/PARTYNEXTDOOR：
[02:38.89]Please don't let this go
[02:42.24]We spent the last three summers on our own
[02:44.68]You're my best friend
[02:48.71]You're my best friend
[02:51.55]I just don't want anyone
[02:54.91]No one at home
data.trans:
[ti:Loyal (feat. Drake)]
[ar:PARTYNEXTDOOR/Drake]
[al:Loyal (feat. Drake)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.35]//
[00:09.35]真的 你在我心里就像一颗星
[00:13.72]你不必和我的朋友过不去
[00:18.30]真的 你好迷人 我们不用伪装
[00:21.18]但我不想和你或我的朋友过不去
[00:26.95]你是我最好的朋友
[00:31.51]你是我最好的朋友
[00:35.96]请你不要伪装 我们可能再次分离
[00:40.64]因为你真的是我最好的朋友
[00:45.89]从头到尾 我都忠贞不二
[00:47.68]我身上很多钱 我也很忠诚
[00:50.00]我兜里很多钱 我也很忠诚
[00:55.05]微醺的时候 痛苦都会烟消云散
[00:57.15]和你在一起的时候 痛苦就会烟消云散
[00:58.85]我
[00:59.46]即使你遇到的问题看似很棘手
[01:01.06]但一切都在掌控之中
[01:04.05]姑娘 不要轻言放弃
[01:06.59]不要轻言放弃
[01:08.69]我们过去三年都在一起度过
[01:11.01]一起度过多少时光
[01:13.17]我们卿卿我我 你又转身就走
[01:18.00]我不想要别人
[01:20.46]谁都不行
[01:21.17]不想要其他人
[01:22.15]//
[01:22.41]真的 你在我的心里就像一颗星
[01:26.05]这是真话
[01:26.94]你不必和我的朋友过不去
[01:31.55]真的 你好迷人 我们不用伪装
[01:34.46]但我不想和你或我的朋友过不去
[01:39.45]//
[01:40.05]你是我最好的朋友
[01:44.73]你是我最好的朋友
[01:49.20]我们可能会再次分离
[01:53.53]你会明白 你是我最好的朋友
[01:57.89]//
[01:58.95]从头到尾 我都忠贞不二
[02:00.87]//
[02:00.93]我身上很多钱 我也很忠诚
[02:02.88]//
[02:03.12]我兜里很多钱 我也很忠诚
[02:05.64]//
[02:08.06]微醺的时候 痛苦都会烟消云散
[02:09.72]//
[02:10.30]和你在一起的时候 痛苦就会烟消云散
[02:12.07]我
[02:12.61]即使你遇到的问题看似很棘手
[02:14.15]但一切都在掌控之中
[02:16.92]//
[02:17.21]姑娘 不要轻言放弃
[02:19.66]不要轻言放弃
[02:21.73]我们过去三年都在一起度过
[02:24.14]一起度过多少时光
[02:26.44]我们卿卿我我 你又转身就走
[02:30.91]我不想就此放弃
[02:34.50]不想要别人
[02:35.85]//
[02:38.89]请不要轻言放弃
[02:42.24]我们过去三年都在一起度过
[02:44.68]你是我最好的朋友
[02:48.71]你是我最好的朋友
[02:51.55]我不想要别人
[02:54.91]不想要其他人
